p: Nrf2 and NQO1 genes have been extensively studied for their defense responses against cytotoxicity and oxidation. Figure 4 showed that the analogue, manuka honey and jiaogulan activated Nrf2 gene at both 1.0% and 2.0%. Other honeys did not show their effect on this gene but they upregulated the downstream NQO1, thus Nrf2 had possibly been expressed differently in these honey treatments before the experimental terminating time (24 h) and later was recorded at the detected level [ 61].
